bibl.title: Berenike 1997. Report of the 1997 Excavations at Berenike and the Survey of the Egyptian Eastern Desert, Including Excavations at Shenshef. (CNWS Publications. Special Series. 4.)
bibl.biblScope: - pp. i-xxii (index), tabl., diagrammes, fac-sim., figg., cartes et 1 plan h. t.
bibl.note: Excavations and survey conducted by the University of Delaware and Leiden University, December 1996 - March 1997. - Pp. 201-205: The Ostraka, by R.S. BAGNALL, C.C. HELMS and A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. A brief overview of the finds [see now: IIDEM, Documents from Berenike. I: Greek Ostraka from the 1996-1998 Seasons = Papyrologica Bruxellensia. 31 (Bruxelles, 2000)]; - 207-218: The Greek-Palmyrene Inscription, by M. DIJKSTRA and A.M.F.W. VERHOOGT. Dedication to the Palmyrene god Hierobol / Yarhibol, between 180/185 and 212 A.D.

bibl.title: Wolfgang Müller
bibl.note: C.R. par Wolfgang Müller, WZKM 90 (2000) pp. 330-338.
